pages.text: The Flower known as $(item)Laetatium$() bears a giant blossom, shining in the colors of calmness and peace.$(br)Because of the heavy blossom, it is as fragile as $(marked)contentment$() itself.$(br2)When meditating, it will increase the probability of waking up with this emotion.
To create Laetatium, simply consume a $(l:vitalis/entry_seed)Dormant Seed$() while under the influence of $(marked)contentment$(), under the clearest skies.$(br2)$(o)(  o  u  o)$()
